title: If I have a used kid\'s bike to donate to a child that thinks they aren\'t getting one,  where can I take it so a needy kid can be riding it on Christmas morning???  Need to know asap  Thanks!  Merry Christmas!  Ho Ho Ho!
text:
You
might try Goodwill on Kerr Avenue. They will usually accept used bikes
in usable condition. The Salvation Army might be another option. Good
luck.
